榰字的基本解释

榰
zhī
柱子下边的墩子。
支撑：“山翠楼频上，云生杖独榰。”

榰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhī］
［《廣韻》章移切，平支，章。］
(1)柱下的木基或石基。
(2)支撑。

榰字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　榰； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页544第19
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】章移切【正韻】旨而切，?音支。【說文】柱砥，古用木，今用石。【徐曰】柱下根也。【爾雅·釋言】榰，柱也。【郭註】相榰柱也。　又【前漢·項羽傳】枝梧，一作榰梧。　又【易·恆卦】上六振恆，凶。【說文】作榰恆。未詳。

考證：〔【爾雅·釋訓】榰，柱也。〕　謹照原書釋訓改釋言。

暂无。

榰
zhī
The pier under the pillar.
Support: "Shancui Tower frequently goes up, Yunsheng sticks alone."
榰
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhī］
["Guangyun" chapter shift cut, flat branch, chapter. ]
(1) Wood base or stone base under the column.
(2) Support.
榰
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　榰; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 544 Page 19
【Tang Yun】【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】Zhang Yiqie 【Zheng Yun】The purpose is to cut, and the sound is supported. [Said the text] Pillar, wood used in ancient times, stone used today. [Xu Yue] The column is also rooted. [Erya·Interpretation] 榰, Zhu Ye. [Guo's Note] Xiangdizhu also.　[Previous Han·Xiang Yu Biography] Zhiwu, the first is Wuwu.　[Easy·Heng Gua] on the six vibrating constant, fierce. [Said the text] as a 榰 Heng. Unknown.
